thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com
thread.title: Lulu T.
thread.title_full: Kiddies Kingdom reviewed by Lulu T.

author: Lulu T.
title: Lulu T.
text: I was slightly hesitant about buying from a company I did not know much about; but after being let down by a major high street retailer and reading the positive reviews of Kiddies Kingdom (the promise of next day delivery, time is of the essence when you are expecting a baby) and of course the great price swayed my decision. I'm very glad I used this company, my travel system (joie litetrax 4) arrived next day (as promised) in perfect condition (and much cheaper than other competitors). I would definitely recommend this company and will use them again when looking for other items for my baby.
